channel.title: VR on Vishwa Shah
channel.description: Recent content in VR on Vishwa Shah

item.title: streetlens
item.description: Constructed a HoloLens app enabling street view previews of Google Maps directions Conceived an algorithm to retrieve data at a consistent time interval using the Google Maps and Street View APIs Collaborated with 3 others under a 36-hour time constraint while learning C# and Visual Studio
